casebody.data:
CHAMBERS
v.
The MOSES H. CONE MEMORIAL HOSPITAL, et al. 147PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 27, 2019 John F. Bloss, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Barry L. Kramer, Attorney at Law, for Chambers, Christopher. Philip J. Mohr, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Brent Fancher Powell, Attorney at Law, Winston-Salem, for The Moses H. Cone Memorial Hospital, et al. Burton Craige, Raleigh, Carol L. Brooke, Jack Holtzman, Raleigh, Clermont F. Ripley, William R. Corbett, Mooresville, Deborah Goldstein, Charlotte, Narendra K. Ghosh, Chapel Hill, Attorneys at Law, for N.C. Justice Center, et al.

*403The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th of June 2018 by Plaintiff to Amend Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 27th of March 2019."
